name: The Flower that Blooms in Red (Westley's Version)
name_original: The Flower that Blooms in Red (Westley's Version)
description:
The Flower That Blooms in Red (Westley's Version) is a 2D remake of an Autodesk Maya animation that was first created in a high school computer lab. What originally started as a constrained boy seeking a rare flower to win the heart of a maiden he long admired becomes a hero's call of duty when Vlad Dracula III launches a siege on London.  As he strives to save this old city below the sky garden from falling into the Dark Lord's clutches, he'll discover this flower's nature that love is more than a courtship between a man and a woman. This installment is beginner friendly and introduces newcomers to the world of Heliotrope Journey through an idiosyncratic story that touches their hearts... before their funny bones get tickled.

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Happy Days In Summer by MusicLFiles

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/8020-happy-days-in-summer

License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Artist website: https://cemmusicproject.wixsite.com/musiclibraryfiles

Music: Gentle Autumn Rain [Full version] by MusicLFiles

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/9810-gentle-autumn-rain-full-version

License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Artist website: https://cemmusicproject.wixsite.com/musiclibraryfiles
